page.title: 08HOME LIFE OF ADULTS,CAUNTON
page.content:
The study group interviewed a random selection of 25 households in Caunton. Each household had approximately 2 children though these children were not necessarily still at home. It was discovered that cleaning windows and ironing were the most unpopular household tasks. On average each household had 5 pets,mostly dogs and cats.
In a survey of labour-saving devices used in the households the group found this: DISHWASHER 24% MIXER 96% MICROWAVE 28% LIQUIDISER 64% TUMBLEDRYER 72% IRON 100% COOKER 100% DEEP FAT FRYER 40% FRIDGE 100%
